text: A faithful Chinese Church hard to find these days. Biblical God-centered sermons can always be expected when the pastor preaches each month plus warm reception. Go early to attend the 8:15am Worship Service as it is often full, else go for the later service at 10:30am. Highly recommended to any Chinese speaking visitors.

A Chinese church that rooted in the word of God. Focus on biblical truth and maturing his people. Links for sermon are easily accessible through their user friendly website. Warm and gracious church members.
Love the new webpage design. Songs and sermons are valuable
All Chinese Church, highly recommended! Anyone of any age can come. Be approachable, amiable, honor God and benefit others! Click Website for more details.
